content:
Congratulations on getting pre-approved for a mortgage!

As of March 2023, the average interest rates for a mortgage in the United States are as follows:

* 30-year fixed-rate mortgage: around 3.75% to 4.00%
* 15-year fixed-rate mortgage: around 3.00% to 3.25%
* 5/1 adjustable-rate mortgage: around 2.75% to 3.25%
* 7/1 adjustable-rate mortgage: around 3.25% to 3.75%

Please note that interest rates can fluctuate daily and may vary depending on your location, credit score, loan amount, and other factors. These rates are general estimates and may not reflect the exact rates available to you.

Since you've already got pre-approved with Bank of America, you're in a good position to negotiate a competitive rate. Be sure to review your pre-approval letter and understand the terms, including the interest rate, APR, and any fees associated with the loan.

When you're ready to finalize your mortgage application, you may want to:

1. Shop around: Compare rates and terms from other lenders to ensure you're getting the best deal.
2. Negotiate: Use your pre-approval from Bank of America as leverage to negotiate a better rate or terms with other lenders.
3. Consider working with a mortgage broker: They can help you compare rates and terms from multiple lenders and find the best option for your situation.

Remember to carefully review and understand the terms of your mortgage before signing any agreements. Good luck with your home buying journey!
